rounds.response:
Top pair (J♣) on a monotone flush board (3♠–7♠–J♠) and the 4♥ is not helping us make the flush. I’m behind any sole spade in Villain’s hand, and risking a big pot right now is thin.

Action: [Check]

rounds.response:
I have top pair (Jacks) with a weak kicker (4). The board is very draw-heavy with two spades, and the 9♣ on the turn adds an open-ended straight possibility. Given the pot is small and I have showdown value, a small, blocking-type bet could be useful to deny equity to hands like random overcards or weaker pairs while keeping bigger hands in the pot. I’ll bet around 40% of the pot.

[Bet 20]
